name: BSSMobile
0:
”alexa, show me the front door”
”alexa, stop”
”alexa, talk to front door”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With BSSMobile ip camera, you can stay connected with what you are in anywhere and any time, access your BSSMobile ip camera using voice command. Free your hands and enjoy your smart life !

How to get skill?
1. Install your mobile app name is BSSMobile and login in it, search all device of ip camera. so you can working on the mobile app.
2. From Alexa app, find and enable BSSMobile skill, login with your mobile app account.
3. Tap discover device in Alexa app to discover your BSSMobile.

After linking your BSSMobile account and discover your device in your Alexa account, you can start control ip camera to your echo show with voice command like:
"Alexa, show Front Door"

if you want stop the BSSMobile ip camera from the video, you can say:
"Alexa, stop"


Compatible Amazon Alexa device
* Echo Show
* Echo spot
* Echo Show 2nd gen

Important Notes:
the doorbell support two way talk from Alexa to doorbell.
when you use this skill, you need to specify the name of your doorbell.

more information you can visit https://www.brillcam.com/

If you have any questions for our skill, please contact our support: https://www.brillcam.com/pages/contact
